block.railways.track_coupler.tooltip.sum: Bind to a track under the _middle_ of a train's _front bogey_, then scroll on top with a wrench to extend the coupler under another train's _rear bogey_.
block.railways.track_coupler.tooltip.con: When the right carriages are over the track points, and the Coupler is in the right mode
block.railways.track_coupler.tooltip.beh: Providing a _redstone signal_ will _couple_ the two trains together.
block.railways.track_coupler.tooltip.con: When a different track targeting block (such as a Train Signal) is bound to the same track
block.railways.track_coupler.tooltip.beh: The coupler icon will _move_ to the side, and they will _coexist_.
block.create.track_station.tooltip.summa: A _deployer_ holding a _wrench_ can automatically assemble and disassemble trains by hitting a _station_. _Hint_: hoppers can be used to put a wrench in a deployer.
block.railways.track_phantom.tooltip.con: When you hold a Phantom Track in your hand
block.railways.track_phantom.tooltip.beh: _Phantom Tracks_ in the world will be _visible_
block.railways.track_phantom.tooltip.con: When you don't hold a Phantom Track in your hand
block.railways.track_phantom.tooltip.beh: _Phantom Tracks_ in the world will be _invisible_
block.create.railway_casing.tooltip.summ: Press and hold the _Focus Schematic Overlay_ key (default _ALT_) to select the _bogey style_ to place.
